Sentencas: In the first part of the study, we present a model of the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) system with anode off-gas recirculation (AGR) in the SchIBZ-project.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of the diesel pre-reforming SOFC-system with anode off-gas recycling in the SchIBZ project. Part II: System exergetic evaluation

Sentencas: In this last second paper, we conduct an exergy analysis of this real SOFC plant, using validated models for the reformer and the SOFC module from our first study.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of the diesel pre-reforming SOFC-system with anode off-gas recycling in the SchIBZ project. Part II: System exergetic evaluation

Sentencas: We find that an optimum recirculation and low O/C-ratios yield a high exergetic efficiency, due to the small exergy losses in the conversion of chemical energy to electrical power in the SOFC-module under these operation conditions.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of the diesel pre-reforming SOFC-system with anode off-gas recycling in the SchIBZ project. Part II: System exergetic evaluation

Sentencas: We conduct our simulations based on a real concept and use validated models, so that the exergy analysis given in this work may be a reliable estimate to the real thermodynamic behavior of this SOFC plant.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of the diesel pre-reforming SOFC-system with anode off-gas recycling in the SchIBZ project. Part II: System exergetic evaluation
